REQ-01.Description: As an administrator, I can add more quotes to the database of quotes.

REQ-02.Description: As anyone, I can visit a webpage to be presented with the newest quote.

REQ-03.Description: As anyone, I can query the server programmatically to get a list of all quotes.

REQ-04.Description: As anyone, I can visit a webpage to be presented with a list of all quotes.
